Header: IT Course Stage III at SFHQ-West Completed
Content: The one month-long Information Technology Certificate Course - Stage III, organized under the guidance of Major General Sathyapriya Liyanage, Commander Security Forces - West (SF-West) at the SFHQ-West auditorium ended on Tuesday (11). All those 31 Army personnel who followed the Course were awarded certificates on the final day. Brigadier Jinendra Thanthiriwatta, Brigadier General Staff of the SFHQ - West as the Chief Guest attended the certificate awarding ceremony.
